items.sentence: Tom knew that Mary was unlikely to be there on time.
Tom knew that he was the only one who could do that.
Tom really wanted to believe that Mary was innocent.
Tom thought he\'d forgotten to tell Mary what to do.
I looked for something I could use to defend myself.
I met Tom in 2013, the year he and Mary got married.
I think I can probably speak French better than Tom.
I think I should probably change my profile picture.
I think Tom will be able to help us figure this out.
I\'ve heard French is a difficult language to learn.
